author: ceki
msg: Added support HSQL. It actually works too!
Successfully supporting HSQL means that we should be able to support
databases with older JDBC drivers as well.

author: ceki
msg: Made ignoresThrowable a settable property. The user can now force a layout
to ignore the throwable in the event

author: yoavs
msg: Replaced call to deprecated closeFile with closeWriter as suggested in closeFile deprecation notice.
